Setting and Merging Datasets¶

Merging is preatty straight forward. Setting even more so. You may want to read in

Setting¶

Setting requires little effort.

Then you get a table like this:

Item Character
1 Puss in Boots
2 Cinderella

what?

A B A and B
False False False
True False False
False True False
True True True

Merging can be done using different joins.
